hibernate-mapping.query: select sp from SensorPort sp where sp.item.itemId = ? and sp.piqId = ? and sp.sortOrder = ? and sp.portSubClassLookup.lkpValueCode = ?
select sp from SensorPort sp where sp.item.itemId = ? and sp.sortOrder = ? and sp.portSubClassLookup.lkpValueCode = ?
update SensorPort sp set sp.piqId = ?, valueActual = ? where sp.item.itemId = ?
update SensorPort sp set sp.sync = false where sp.item = (select i from Item i where i.itemId = ?) and sp.portSubClassLookup <> (select sub from LksData sub where sub.lkpValueCode = ?)
delete from SensorPort pp where pp.item.itemId = ? and pp.sync = FALSE
select sp from SensorPort sp where sp.item.itemId = ? and sp.portSubClassLookup.lkpValueCode <> ? and sp.sync=FALSE
select sp from SensorPort sp where sp.item.itemId = ? and not (sp.portSubClassLookup.lkpValueCode = ? and sp.sortOrder = ?)
select sp from SensorPort sp where sp.item.itemId = ? and sp.portSubClassLookup.lkpValueCode = ?
update SensorPort sp set sp.sync = false where sp.item = (select i from Item i where i.itemId = ?) and sp.portSubClassLookup = (select sub from LksData sub where sub.lkpValueCode = ?)
select sp from SensorPort sp where sp.item.itemId = ? and sp.portSubClassLookup.lkpValueCode = ? and sp.sync=FALSE
select sp.portId from DataPort sp where sp.item.itemId = ? and sp.used = 'true'
